content.detailedDescription: Last night(dec.20th)in hillsborough, nj, my husband and i were outside on the porch at approximately 1:25 am, and something caught my eye.  it was definitely rod/cigar shaped, moving quickly across the sky.  it looked like a thin cloud layer, but it was a definite structure, and completely silent.  it appeared to be huge from our observation..With arm's length out straight, it appeared about 2 inches tall from top to bottom.  it was headed southwest-ish, and went between jupiter and orien. it was about as high as jupiter was in the sky at the time. i have witnessed ufos before around here, but never seen anything like this!!  unfortunately, it went by too fast, and we were not able to get any pictures or footage. i am thankful my husband had also seen it, so i know i wasn't imagining it! we lost sight of it after a few seconds due to some cloud coverage.  my husband also claims afterward, he had a ringing sound (like crickets) in his ears.  i did not experience that myself. we definitely felt it was not man made..There was no mistaking this for a plane!!
content.summary: Cigar/rod shaped ufo moving rapidly across sky with no sound and huge in nj   !

content.detailedDescription:
I was outside my construction trailer guarding the hydroone site. it is a 230 kv transformer site. i was working as a security guard, guarding a 55 acre site. the site is surrounded by a mond or tiny hill, fields, and a dirty road. it was 0813 p.M. when i first heard a whirling noise over a hydropole. immediately i realized it as a strange object. the object looked like a sausor or conical shape whirling and coming down from east to west with a height of over 100 to 200 feet. immediately i took my sony digihi8 camera and filmed the object. the object travelled east to west, then hit and travelled through the hydro lines, and then flew towards north where my  trailer is situated, passed again by descending the hydro lines of over 100 feet and came and hit the trailer and a loud bang is heard. the object pulsated and gave beams of light and flew away towards east. after i checked the video footage in slow motion it appeared the object has passed into the trailer. when it passed into the wooden trailer the light appeared like a mushroom. i was shocked and amazed what that tiny object could be. is it a probe? or exterrestrial craft or how can it pass through 430 volts hydro lines and enter the trailer from roof and fly away?. after it flew away i zoomed the camera as much as i can and the video came very good. the video is very stable because of the old sony digitalhi8 camera.

** please analyze my video and let me know what it is. i have observed this phenomenon on this site more than once. i do not want anything but only my name. thanks. 
narendra.
content.summary: It appreared suddenly whirling and descending, passed through hydro lines, and hit the construction trailer and entered it and cameout and flew away. the object is about 1feet. video taken with a sony digihi8 camera with date time stamp.

content.detailedDescription: Stepped outside to smoke and these lights that are not common...I my area cause they were going west slow in a file no notice...I was just there struck by the lights but my neighbor kept yelling at me...If i was seeing them i acknowledge...Ran inside and got my canon video camera and stared filming...The rest you can see if you would like...
content.summary: Best way to describe is that i have a video you tell me....Want it call me its free...

content.detailedDescription: I have many photos and avery breif video.
content.summary: Walked outside,turned north, ther it or them were hovering at top of trees. i took many pictures as well as another person with me.

content.detailedDescription: I was araiving home from work still in my car i slow down because the road is bumbpy, when i noticed with my left eye a light i rapidly turnd my head and see what clearly i identify as an alien vessell passing desending and then straight ,glowin white blue ,for abaut a second no sound , and lost track of it ,it pased through clouds and faded.	it was abaut  150-200ft from my face ,,,aproximatly at80mph.Y recogniced what it was and staid in shock scared and then felt overwelmd and paralized rapidly told my wife and comented on facebook then a friend told mi to report it. ihave so many questions ,,,and feel gratfull for whitnesing this vessell pass thru,,,but scared
content.summary: A roud vessell glowing white blue

content.detailedDescription: My roommate and i went out to sit on our apartment patio to smoke.  we immediately both saw a glowing sphere in the sky southeasteast of greenville, tx. it was about half the size of the moon when full.  if you held your finger and thumb up where it was about an inch and a half in diamter. it did not move but had very unusual glowing coloring, king of changing color of yellow/red/gold sometimes showing an aura that was dark red around the sphere, then sometimes it looked bluish white. it did not pulsate but the colors changed, making it appear to twinkel.  it was a little hard to look at it because it was so bright.  we watched it for about 2 hours; the next night it was there again. the 2nd night we watched it for 3 hours.  it was there every night for 2-3 weeks.  it never moved at all but its glow did change and the shape changed a little due to the aura that was around the edge. the aura changed shape but was definitely a different color that the sphere inside of it. we tried to find out on the dallas metroplex tv media if anyone else had seen it; they did report it on wfaa channel 8 evening news, but they never said whether it was determined to be a known object or not. later i found out through talking to people here in greenville that they saw it as well, and apparently it was visible 50 miles away in dallas, according to wfaa.  i don't of anyone ever explaining what this object was, but it was like nothing i have ever seen and we could not take our eyes of it. i could not stay up late enough each night to see where it went or if it just disappered.
content.summary: My boyfriend and i saw a very bright sphere hovering to the south east east from our apartment patio. it was there for about 2-3 weeks.

content.detailedDescription:
At 1 am, about 25 white-orange glowing spheres flew slowly by my window from the right side. distance from my bedroom window was about 1000 feet. they all followed a straight path, then every sphere turned almost 90��� right (away from my house) when reaching the point, where they were right in front of me.
as each sphere reached that point, it turned. no speed change, just new direction, until they were all out of sight. i guess they flew a minimum distance of over 40 miles like this. speed was maybe 10 mph. it all lasted almost 20min.

i made a video with my cam, and my wife recorded it with a photo-cam. but when i tried to replay afterwards, my video was inaccessable, it was destroyed.And, shortly after we stood in front of the window, we noticed a high pitch buzzing sound, which i heard before on a similar occasion. it was like one of those invisible disks was hovering directly over us and watching us, maybe that's how they destroyed my cam-disk. it was really loud and not comming from those spheres. i guess the invisible one was steering the spheres or controlling them, like shown in jaime maussans videos.
the video from my wife only shows lights in the dark, it's not really good. it's a shame, my cam would have made a great video.
content.summary: White-orange glowing spheres, with white fog aura

content.detailedDescription:
On november 16th, 2011, at approximately 6:30 pm, i was driving my regular route home on a wednesday after work on rt 45 west toward state college, pa. 
as i was driving along a particularly dark and sparsely populated stretch of the two lane country road a few miles past woodward, i suddenly noticed this band of very bright lights, seemingly sitting up on a hill, a couple miles off the road to my left.  the slightly curved downward band was approximately 80 feet long and made up of adjoining rectangular lights of graduating colors that ranged from a very light peach to deeper orange tones.  while all lights remained brightly lit, they were further illuminated by a pulse-like, fluid, wave motion proceeding and repeating from my left to right.  the lights, and one tea-rose/melon one in particular, struck me as utterly beautiful and it took a concerted effort to refocus on the dark, windy country road.
my initial response was "oh, they must be doing some road work over there" and wondering why they'd be still working so late. it took a second or two to realize that there was no road but only a wooded ridge over there, and the lights were not like anything in terms of colors or formation, i had ever seen at a road construction site, or anywhere else for that matter.  i did a double take and looked back at the lights with my rational mind shifting into overdrive in an attempt to make sense out what i was seeing.
the road, now curving downward toward one of the amish farms along the way on the right, again demanded my attention and a rather high bank on my left, temporarily, obscured my view of the lights.  when i emerged out of the dip in the road on the other side, apx 10 seconds later, and looked back again, i saw a vastly smaller version of the light formation i had seen way back in the distance.  i saw no trace of the large formation but did not know if that was due to obstructing features in the terrain, or if that formation had receded quite a distance back within the 10 seconds out of my sight.  the small formation in the distance disappeared from my view with the next turn in the road.
again, my rational mind raced to make sense out of this but none of the data wanted to compute. was there one or two formations, and were they communicating with their pulsating light waves?  or was there only one that receded in an incredibly short time span? i felt rather confused and increasingly scared ... and called a friend to inquire what she'd make out of this chain of events. i was never so glad to reach the town of aaronsburg a short time later and felt much relief in the perceived protection of civilization. 
i have engaged in reality testing ever since whenever i travel along that spot in the road once or twice a week.  i verified in day time that there is absolutely nothing but a wooded ridge where i had seen the lights , and came to realize that, based on their location, they must have hovered over the trees.  when returning in the evening, i have ruled out other potential sources of lights.  there are absolutely none along that stretch.
i have not seen the lights again ... but find myself strangely yearning to see them again ... and especially the one color that appealed to me in particular.  when i think or speak about that light, i find myself getting goose bumps along my left forearm.  other than that ... there is no noticeable effect of the events.
content.summary: Observation of huge, slightly curved, band of bright, oblong, wave-like pulsating lights

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving on south tully rd. because of the s.J.I.Airport large aircraft are constantly landing and taking off. there is almost no small air traffic in this area. as i was coming to the intersection of tully and old tully rd.
 low to the horizon i saw a strange copper gold flash. the shape was very strange and not a typical reflection. a smallish fuzzy whitish orb appeared
to emerge from the flash and propel itself away at high speed. it climbed to 3/4 of a mile sharply banked to the right dove and seemed to hide behind the the big blue arch of the fairgrounds. as this was happening i was the passenger so i could keep my eye on it as we made a u-turn i kept watching and it did not pass the arch in the foreground really as if it was hiding behind it from my view.
content.summary: I saw a bright copper/gold flash that turned into a whitish orb

content.detailedDescription:
I was traveling north on monterey rd. approx. 1 mile from cottle blvd. i was driving and being new to the area i was looking around as i drove when i noticed a large black ring very sooty and dark. it was about fifty feet off the ground and 1/4 mile away to my left directly over a residential neighborhood. it was completely still not rising or visibly dissipating. however it did look like it was starting to come apart with wispy tendrils
stretching upwards. once i saw it i was fascinated i watched it until traffic forced me to pay more attention to the road then was blocked by large trees as i continued on. i didnt have a camera but i could sketch 
what i saw.
content.summary: In the late afternoon i observed a very large black smoke ring

content.detailedDescription: I was just out getting my mail last night (tues 12/20/11)at 7:15pm and saw this weird orange thing flying up in the sky - it was strange because the light was larger than a plane, and it flickered like a flame. i was moving across the sky, make a slight curve and then it stopped - which really got me interested, because planes don't do that! it stayed stationary in the sky for a few seconds and then it slowly started to dim, until it finally disappeared completely.  i stood waiting for a while to see if it would reappear but it didn't - it was just the dark night sky with no trace of it.  btw - it was a completely clear night (no clouds at all) and stars were visible.  i had never seen this kind of movement in the sky and thought it must be an alien spacecraft.  i was not afraid or anything, and even tried to talk to it when it had stopped - asking - can you see me?
content.summary: Large orange light moving across night sky, curved slightly and then came to a stop and hovered, then slowly dimmed and disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: I know what i saw is a ufo. i was driving eastbound down marshalee drive in elkridge, md tonight towards montgomery road (on 12/21/11) a little after 11:00pm (probably 11:08pm) next to timbers at troy golf course. i was the only car on the road until half way through my sighting. out my windshield over a large parking lot to my left i see a huge basketball sized shiny black triangle craft that was not a helicopter with randomly alternating red, white, and green lights on the corners and i slowed my truck to about 15 mph. the lights seemed to be purposely changing to deceive the eye as it was hard to follow the craft. the ufo also had a box-shaped structure behind it which followed its every move and looked as though it was connected to the triangle facade. the ufo was extremely low to the ground, i would say roughly 500 feet. as i drove towards the object and sped to about 30 mph, i reached down for my cell phone then looked up and saw the object seem to change shape to become very skinny, almost in the form of a sideways view of the traingle, then  the craft rocketed across my windshield in three seconds finishing to a floating stop (changing directions from left to right in my perspective). the craft relocated unbelievably quickly. the ufo then hovered over route 100 east and at this time our pace was about 1/4 mile before the exit to get on route 95 south as marshalee drive runs directly parallel to rt. 100. the craft followed me side-by-side like it was tracking me until two cars got closer behind me. the ufo then changed it's path to relocate back to marshalee drive over top of my truck when i got almost to the left bend of the road to head towards montgomery road. i bent my body over the passenger's seat to track the ufo and caught a quick glimpse of the object before it dissapeared in mid air. this sighting lasted no more than one minute and it appeared the people in the cars behind me also saw the craft because they were driving under the speed limit about three car lenghts behind me. i have always wanted to see a ufo and i am absoultely convinced that what i saw tonight was the product of an unidentifiable flying object. no object build by man could travel the way that triangle object moved. either the goverment knows what appeared in the maryland skies tonight or that was an alien craft or maybe santa is real. my money is on the government running missions with aliens.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Huge black triangle ufo with red, white, and green alternating, pulsating lights at corners hovering over elkridge

content.detailedDescription:
I first saw the object at 10:00 pm, cst, it is sse of my position hovering in the sky.  i'm approximating above minneapolis, mn.  at first glance i thought it was a bright white star until i noticed it flashing red on the left, green on the left and yellow on the bottom.  i rushed for my binoculars (10 x 50) and viewing it with the the flashing lights are much more pronounced.  it's 10:40 pm now and it's still there.  it's position is about half way between the orion star group and the horizon.  for all i know it could be in orbit but, it's not moving like a satellite tracking across the sky.  it's 10:45 now and it's still there.  it's tracking with orion.  it could be in geosynchronous orbit maybe.

several planes were flying toward from it from the west but veered off. three that i noticed.  there is airplane activity nearer the ground, to far away to tell what type, i think there's a small airport near fridley, or crystal, mn.

it's almost out of view of my window now.  i'm pretty sure it's in orbit now, still tracking with orion, still flashing different colored lights.  it must be huge if it's in orbit and i can see lights flashing with my binoculars.
content.summary: Starlike, flashing three corners - red, blue, green, yellow, white in the middle.

content.detailedDescription: Driving from kirkland wa to duvall wa and observed flashes of light like a meteor or lightning.  turned onto woodinville-duvall rd and observed more flashes and then three huge balls of light that were moving at tree top level.  lights then began to twinkle/flash as we drove farther down the road.  lost sight after about 1 mile.
content.summary: Flashes like lightning, three huge balls of twinkling light

content.detailedDescription: I had not long gotten off from work. my neibor and i were sitting on my deck. i heard an airplaine and i looked up and saw an airplane aproaching at a very high altitude. i don't know what type of airplane it was but it was up in or near the jet stream alttitude. as i was looking upwards this cilinder object flying along the same trjectory but much much lower whizzed by and i yelled at my neibor to look but when he did it had passed as ihave a tree line close to my home. it was large , it had a cylinder shape and it made no noise whatsoever even though it was close .Had it not been for the plane i would not have looked up and noticed it at all.
content.summary: Cilinder object silver in color moving at a steady excelarated speed at a medium height no sound no external features

content.detailedDescription: I was walking with a friend and his dog at night about 7pm or so on sunday, dec.18, 2011, when about a block from returning home i noticed some stars above, not a whole lot, but did notice a star moving horizontally. it didn't move fast or far horizontally, but slow.  i decided to get my cell phone and zoom in to take a picture, then also captured in video. i was astonished to see how this star was moving erratically side to side, up and down, disappearing and glowing.  well it may have been about 15-20 minutes that my friend and i was just watching the object when i went home to get my jacket and someone else to look at what we were looking at. it was another 10 minutes before we went home and about 10 minutes later we sought to see this object again, but by now it was farther out at a distance and hard to get a visual as we did previously. in addition, at the very same time on monday, i notice that same star in within the same area and after a half hour or so, it moved away far into the distance.
content.summary: Saw unusual star moving horizontal stopped to get a picture & video zoomed in a much as cell phone would allow.

content.detailedDescription: I went outside at 6:07 pm specifically to look for the object that has been in our western sky for the past 2 nights.  as i looked to the position where it had been before it was again there.  it did change position and moved slightly more west from my position.  it has very bright lights in the center and pulsating red, blue and white lights around its edges.  it appears to be round in shape.  i did not ever feel threatened by its presence.  at 7:25 it disappeared (like switching off a light).
content.summary: Three nights in a row

content.detailedDescription:
while driving a semi truck hauling a lowboy trailer w/acaterpiller d-8 dozer in july 1978about 730 mt time my wife noticed a star in sky at about 45 degrees inclination to the north east. looking to east  i could see the moon well up and looking to s.West sun was setting . sun was about 3/4 below horizon. when i looked back to north east at my wifes excited urging i saw to my amazement the star we had seen was now moving toward us and appeared to be growing larger. the meteor,i thought was getting much bigger until neared snall mountain directly in front of us at about 5000 ft agl/above groud leve theobject stopped and hovered for about 30 sec then landed on th side of the mountain i just mentioned im assumeing it landed but it could hav been hovering behind mt. but it did not wobble at all this object was /im estamating/ 5000-10000 ft in diameter 1-2 miles ive never seen anything this large that was capable of moving under its own power   fyi  im a licenced commercial pilot and used to be a certified flight instructor. in 1988 i stopped flying because i could only pass medical for private pilot not for commercial because my depth perception had detearated im 65 now as i write this   back to sitting
  after it appeared large object had landed nothing happened for about 2 min then about 6 very small silvery objects that looked like alifting body type aircraft no real apparent wings shapped like a spear point came out of object made one orbit around large object and flew towaed n.W. at what i would guess at mach 2+ its been so many rears since we saw this ive become dulled to the excitment i felt this /what i now call a ufo/ if any one would look at a nasa photo of the sun and its corona  u would seen almost an identicle picture of what we saw that day i want to make sure its understood that this all took place in full daylight on a clear almost cloudless day there were over 35 vehicles stopped with us on north bound side of road with about 10 vehicles stopped on south bound side there were 8 peopl that i talked to on my side of hwy that took 8mm movie of all or part of this sighting i esamate that 100+ people witnessed this eventwhen objet departed it climbed about 5000ft hovered for a few sec then accelerated back allong its approach path from its hover position until it sisappeared to space took about 30 sec fyi this is first time ive  told any one except for 3 or 4 friends and of cource tey didnt belive oh yes later the next day i called flight service and the faa said they had no radar contact with any craft at that time of day in that area  the faa would not tell me about any other reports  this was a long time ago so it may not be of much interest
content.flightPath: Stationary,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Extremely large object  over one mile  dia. decended frm orbit?  landed/approx 7  small  objects exited lge ob. flew  n.W. at hi speed 5min later returned to lge ob made 1 orbit of lge ob  entered lge ob /lge ob ascended  5000 ft hovered then hovered  ---
content.locationName: S.E. OF WIND RIVER CANYON, Wyoming

content.detailedDescription:
It was december 17th, 2011, at about 9:30 pm cst.

i was watching a movie with my wife karen when we heard what we thought was a loud truck or piece of farm equipment outside (we live in the country).  it continued to get louder, then much louder.  our dog's ears laid back and she started to growl.  i muted the tv.  the sound increased as whatever it was got closer.  it was then the house started to vibrate and a high pitched whine (the sound you hear before a crash)mixed itself with the roar that sounded like a jet engine with a slow, low rpm.  my wife cried out "something is going to hit the house!"  i rushed to the front door and opened it to see what it could be.  as i opened the door i got scared.  i truly believed that a jet or something huge was about to hit the house or the neighborhood.  "oh my god" i said.  "it's going to crash!"  i have a roof over my front porch so i couldn't see directly overhead.  by then the noise was scary.  i ran through the kitchen and out the back door onto the deck as i shouted for my wife to come out.  she ran out just as the object was passing by overhead no more that two to three hundred feet above us and to my left.  i can't tell you how stunned i was.  the object had passed by and now i could just see the back of it.  it was larger than my house and completely black except for the four visible lights on the back of it.  one white light in each corner with two smaller red lights toward the bottom and slightly inward.  "what the hell is that?" i asked, not believing what i was witnessing.  "karen, objects that big can't go that slowly and remain aloft...It's impossible.  i know the stall-speed of a small plane is about 55 or sixty mph.  this thing was doing 25...Maybe.  i wish i could describe the sound of that engine more accurately.  it was the most powerful thing i have ever heard.  the freaky thing is that it was just idling.  that thing wasn't turning 1500 rpms.  it was just idling and carrying that ship easily, quietly, except for the engine noise which sounded as though it were coming out the back.  no color.  no flame.  no heat.  freaky.  it just drifted along at maybe 25-30 mph.  incredulous. anyway, we watched it fade over the field behind our house then my son came out and we could still hear the engine fading after the craft had disappeared for maybe twenty more seconds.

my son was back in his room with earphones on and heard nothing until he came out back.  he heard it then but it had faded from sight.  so we jumped in the car and ran down our zig-zaggy country roads in an effort to see it again but to no avail.  this thing was going as the crow flies and we never saw it again.

the next morning at church i asked if anyone had seen the object friday night.  most had already gone to bed.  however, mike (who lives over the hill)said his dogs went crazy at 9:30 and when he went out to check he heard what he thought was a sonic boom then sirens but saw nothing.

that's about it. oh, one more thing.  this morning at the library a family heard me asking if anyone there had seen anything strange on friday night when a woman and her two young sons (12 & 8?)approached me and the boys said at about 9:30 friday night they heard it and went outside and the older one caught a glimpse of it.  the younger child stated to me that his tv remote went haywire and started changing channels on its own and doing strange things.  none of that happened to me.  

well, that's about it.  i am dieing that i didn't grab a camera but it was already too late by the time i figured out it was something weird in the sky above the house.  the entire event probably took 30 or forty seconds.  but it was awe inspiring to see something that big move so slowly through the air so close to the ground.  and it was loud.  that engine sounded as though it had the power to leave the planet.  it effortlessly carried that huge craft at a mere idle.  freaky.

okay then, that's my very true story.  we live in an area that has a good bit of very loud military helicopters and large cargo planes that traverse the skies but this was none of those...Not even close.

have a very merry christmas!
(name moved to fi box) cms 12/21/11 09:21 cst flg
content.summary: Saw an object above me moving ever so slowly for its size.

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting outside on the porch at about 10:20 pm and was about to go inside when i decided to look up at the stars. while i did see stars i also saw a bright spherical object flying in a straight line overhead. i could only see a light. i could see no distinct object. it was not like an aircraft because there was no strobe light and there was only one large light. it was flying north the whole time towards the great salt lake and appeared to be descending very slowly(barely noticeable). i could hear no audible sounds during its appearance. after about a minute it flew too far for me to be able to see it. after seeing it i went inside feeling slightly nervous and apprehensive.
content.summary: Bright spherical lighted object overflies salt lake city

content.detailedDescription: I went out my front door this morning (0625 hrs) to look at the sky before my shower since this is when alot of activity has been happening (alot of "strange" orbs have been appearing within this last week right before dawn). i noticed 2 bright red orbs flying across the sky from ne to sw (from the cupertino quarry/san jose area towards morgan hill). as it flew by my condo and off towards morgan hill i noticed that it appeared as if the orbs were "attached" to each other, but spaced apart at about the size of a chopper. the first orb stayed solid red, and the back orb flashed solid red at 1 second intervals. it had a chopper sound to it, and made navigational curves (not quite turns, but curving to change directions). as i watched it, i was looking specifically for white or blue lights thinking it might just be a chopper, but no other lights ever appeared, even with the navigational direction change. after it left my viewing area, i noticed that pacing behind it was a sjpd chopper about 45 degrees above it, and about 1000 feet behind. (we see alot of police chopper activity at night, so i know what their bird looks like.) it just paced at the same speed and was folloing the object. i didn't have time to get the digi camera or video cam out, so i just watched.
content.summary: 2 red balls of light, back on flashing

content.detailedDescription:
I was walking my dog here in seminole  and i was distracted by a craft above me wit huge lights in the sky.

i looked up, and just up in the sky was a triangle ufo with four lights.

i was on the phone at the time with a friend and i said, "i think i am seeing a ufo above me". she replied that i should take a photo.

i pointed my i-phone at it a second later and was able to get these two shots as it was disappearing.

when i blow these up you can clearly see a triangle ship with a huge lead light and three tail lights.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Sighting above me as i walked my dog

content.detailedDescription:
I was walking my dog here in seminole, florida on december 12, 2011 and i was distracted by a huge triangle ship above me with four huge lights on its underbelly. 

i stared at this object for a moment, then reached into my pocket and pulled out my i-phone and snapped off a few pictures of it as it made its way off int the distance.

i was able to get these two shots.

when i blew these up on my i-phone you can clearly see a triangle ship with four huge lights.
content.summary: Nothing like i have ever seen before, shocked!

content.detailedDescription:
For the second night in a row i observed a multi-lighted (sequentially flashing red, blue & white edge lights and a white center light) object hovering in the western sky very near my house.  i live about 5 miles from the gulf of mexico and this object, on dec. 17, 2011, was quite a way out over the water.  i first saw it at around 7:00 pm and observed it for about 15-20 minutes.  at 8:00 pm i went out to look for the object again but it was no longer there.  last night (dec. 18, 2011) i went out at 6:17 pm to see if the object had returned and there it was!  it was much closer to my house this time and much brighter.  i remained outside observing the object for approximately 15 minutes (i took pictures with my iphone on both nights).  i went back to the house and retrieved a pair of low power binoculars.  they helped to more clearly see the flashing multi-colored lights.  at 7:00 pm i again went out to check on the object.  it was still there, however, it had moved much further out over the water of the gulf.  i returned to my house after 5 minutes of observation.  at 8:00 pm i again went out to see the object, but it was no longer there. 

this is not my first sighting.  when i was 16 y.O. i witnessed, on a clear september night in massachusetts, an object that flashed across the sky, stopping instantly, then changing directions several times, then flying off at unbelievable speed. 

i am now a 66 y.O. retired healthcare administrator.
content.summary: Multi lighted ufo seen hovering near the shoreline in seminole florida

content.detailedDescription: Late night after a college football game, i have three videos on my iphone and can be see on youtube titled [title redacted/cms/tg] with the username [username redacted/cms/tg]. friends were at my house with the normal drinking amount for any college student of age. it was later in the evening around 2 am so it was 10-10-10 at that time. my friend noticed a bright light that did not look to far but at the time to far to think anything of. then another light appeared and they seem to move aroun each other in no manner a human operating a flying electronic copter could possible maneuver, and really what pro rc flyer is out on a saturday at 2am flying his plane. although since my posted video on youtube i am starting to see more actually rc planes fly astound the same area with the same colors in my video. after witnessing that makes me believe that they might be doing that to settle the media, because there is a clear diference in the movements and smooth flow the lights saw compared to the rc planes flying around. check out the youtube videos and witness for yourself.
content.summary: Not r/c helicopter moved randomly but possible in patern, unusual natural movements

content.detailedDescription:
Driving north to fond du lac, wi, from waupun, on us 151, roughly halfway between the two cities, closer to lamartine. it was dark at 6:13 pm when i noticed to my left this incredibly bright, pulsating red light, followed a moment later by an equally bright white light. it was so stunning, i said to my daughter, sitting beside me, "what the heck is that?" i would estimate these lights to be a few miles away, probably 30 degrees off the horizon. my daughter said, "maybe it's a plane," and we kept driving. 

these did not appear to be standard aircraft lighting, with a steady blinking or steady white or red lights, anti-collision type lights. i couldn't stop looking at them! the light would blink fast red, then fast white off to the red's left (my right), and then there would be a moment of blackness from the night. from what i know about aircraft, there are supposed to be steady "on" lights, which there was nothing of. no green light on the wingtip, for instance, and this object wasn't near enough an airport to be landing with those lights: if another pilot had seen them, he/she would have been blinded, i'm sure of it.

my initial thought was these lights were coming towards us, heading southeast, but as i watched them flashing, i thought maybe it's standing still. it didn't look like any lights i'd seen on aircraft before. "that's no plane," i said. the red lights would pulsate very fast...Then a second later, the white, almost like they were communicating with each other. what was even more amazing was the size of this. at the distance i think we were seeing these lights, the distance between the red and white lights was very wide, wider than an aircraft wing would have been at that distance (about 3-4 miles, estimated). the red light appeared to be a little above the white, as if it were on top of the craft, and the white light off to the right of the craft, as on a wing (from my perspective). i'd estimate that they were a penny-width apart, when you hold your fingers out at arm's length. if it were two different aircraft, they were flying in perfect formation, but i got the feeling it was one craft and it was huge.

as we tried to make sense of the lights in the sky, the object appeared to change course and was now headed back the way it came: not moving/banking like an ordinary aircraft but rather just reversing course and the bright, pulsing lights moved farther away.

i pulled over and we watched the lights for several moments on the side of the highway. i tried to get a picture of it but my cell phone didn't take a great photo of it. it was after my attempt to take a photo that the lights appeared to now move in a northeasterly direction, going just north of fond du lac, banking a little. we followed them until our vision was obscured by trees in lamartine. the lights were approximately 3-5 miles away, i'm sure, but as bright as a camera flash. in fact, my daughter kept repeating, "they're taking pictures! they're taking pictures!" i don't know if they were or not, but that is the intensity of the lights, a camera flash, where it momentarily blinds the eye. i distinctly remember trying to see if the lights projected downward, like it was scanning the ground, but could see nothing like that. even the red flashing light was intense. we had a clear, unobstructed view of these lights for several minutes before the trees obscured our view, but we did see them for a time afterward, until they faded from view. entire sighting lasted from 6:13 pm until 6:19 pm. (central standard time).

estimated time watching these lights, about 6 minutes. the pulsating never varied, always the red for one second, then the white for a second, and these were exactly equal in time pulsing, then nothing, black. then back again, and always the same very wide distance apart, a bit on an angle. at times we thought it was one craft, and other times we thought they could be two. it looked like the aircraft banked at one moment before we lost sight of it behind the trees. when we came to the other side of the stand of trees, the lights were very faint and far away. it seemed in no great hurry, and was headed in the direction of oshkosh/appleton, over lake winnebago.

we were not scared or concerned, just amazed at these pulsating lights. my daughter and i haven't spoken of it since.

if it was a very large aircraft, i would be happy to know it. as it is, i'm not sure what we saw but it was definitely something unusual. this is the third report i'm filing with mufon in the past 2 1/2 years. we're seeing some interesting things in this area.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Incredibly bright, pulsating red and white lights in tandem

content.detailedDescription: At home in severn area, family member noticed something strange occuring outside and alerted everyone in home (six adults at a dinner party).  it was about 0650 pm.  when we got outside, facing south, saw a line of bright orange glowing objects moving moving from west (right) to east (left) ascending from beyond the treeline.  they  flew rapidly across the sky, with most appearing to ascend until they disappeared from view.  one or two would continue on an easterly trajectory vice the steeper ascent and fade from view.  there was a group of about 10-12, then a pause of a few seconds, then a 2nd group of similar size flew the same route in about the same pattern and speed.  we began to go back inside, when after a pause of about 60-90 seconds a 3rd group repeated the display.  most of the shapes were evenly spaced, but occassionally one would slow down and the gap would close. after calming down i rang a neighbors doorbell so that they could see what was happening.  by the time he came out, he witnessed the last of the objects as it faded from view on the easterly trajectory.  all together the event lasted about 12 minutes.  we did not get video or pictures of the objects, but they were very similar to those noted in another submission i saw on this site in the severn area on 18 december, with an accompanying video.  however, the objects we saw did not appear to hover, but moved continuously, evenly spaced, but with some randomness in speeds. they were all equal in size and dimension, and emitted a low buzzing sound what ever they were was strange to me and my family, i have never witnessed anything like it and i am a 22 year air force veteran's wife.  i think that there is something unexplaineable that occured on december 18th 2011 in the skies in severn.
content.summary: Saw 3-series of evenly spaced lights, ascending from beyond site line of neighborhood homes.  bright orange circular lights on an ascending flight path most disappearing from view.

content.detailedDescription:
1. was placing recyleables into bin--in my back yard-- when i looked up to south-west sky and noticed satellite progressing north.  looked to cassiopeia for other possible south-heading satellites as the night is cloudless.
2. noted the very rapid speed, no blinking of nav lights, and was silent.  its 5 lights were blurred / hazy,  but plainly observable.
3. initially thought it was an aircraft, but was not exhibiting colored/ blinking nav lights. positioning of 5 lights on object showed a sweep of more than 40 degrees from tip light to either tip. i thought it unusual in shape unlike commercial aircraft wing sweep.
4. 5 lights arraged in a boomerang shape, proceeded south-east at a very rapid, constant speed, without blinking nav lights, and was blurred--somewhat--as if to mask or lessen its observability.
5. chills
6. line of sight was obscured by neighbors' large cedar tree.
content.summary: 5 lights in boomerang-shape passed thru cassiopeia on heading to saturn was silent w/o blinking nav lights. no aircraft in area. moved exceedingly fast. to south/east.

content.detailedDescription:
i was walking north by a baseball park,happened to look right and up for
 jupiter,below,saw bright red object then a smaller orange one seperating
 up and to the right of first object. they appeared to be in a right bank,
 like aircraft. discounting aircraft,having worked on the flight-line for
 20 yrs. lights of this color and brightness dont just appear on a clear
 night with out some sort of an approach.These 2 lights ejected 4 smaller  
 ones to the left and down. something similar to a citation 5 in a right
 bank. this lasted 4-5 secs.Then vanished.I scanned a couple seconds and
 these lights reappeared in the same line fashion for a couple more 
 seconds,then vanished.I know this is something i will forever remember.
 and, i have faith in the believers.
content.summary: 1 large red light,1smaller seperating orange light ,then 4 seperating lights

content.detailedDescription:
Newark, wayne county, ny
 
i'm not certain there's a benefit in reporting this other than the hopes that someone else saw more than i did. i'm not certain what it was, but when you consider the clearly defined terminology of a ufo, it definitely fits that criteria - i don't know what it was (unidentified), it was flying, and it was definitely an object.

monday, 08:10am. visibilty:clear and unobstructed. blue skies w/ no cloud ceiling.

 i was traveling to work in a nw direction on hydesville rd. i had just crested a hill and was starting to travel down a slight slope with about 1/8th to 1/4 mile visibility in front of me before hydesville curved slightly to the south. ahead was the junction for sandhill rd which travels north off hydesville rd. directly opposite the junction of sandhill, on the south side, is a stand of scrub trees approximately 20 - 30' tall. again, i had crested the hill and i had a clear, unobstructed view of the sandhill rd. junction approximately 1/8th to 1/4 mile in front of me. i immediately saw what i first thought was a pure white private aircraft barely clearing the treetops from the south and crossing the roadway at 20 -30 ft of altitude in a northbound flightpath. as it crossed hydesville i thought i could detect it starting to ascend at the same rate as sandhill rd. duration of this sighting was probably less than a second considering it's estimated speed of 50mph combined with my field of view of perhaps 100 or so feet from my reported distance away, which, again, i estimate at 1/8th to 1/4 mile. 

in the split second i observed this object it became very clear to me that this was not a private aircraft as it had no wings, vertical stabilizer, cockpit, registration number, graphics, and any landing gear was non-evident. nor did it have a perceptible smooth surface that an aircraft would have. if anything, it appeared to have clearly defined protrusions that stuck out at fairly acute angles. i can only describe it as having a lego-type structure - an all white, lego-type structure. the angles and protrusions were that clearly defined. overall length i would have to estimate at less than 25' as it did not take up both lanes of hydesville rd as it passed over.

i knew i wanted to see more of whatever it was i just saw. it took me a few seconds to get to sandhill rd. i turned north on sandhill and progressed up a slight hill where the view went from fairly heavily wooded to a moderately open area where visibility widened substantially. i saw nothing. whatever it was had either eluded my view, crashed, or simply vanished. considering the speed at which it was traveling, relative to the time it took me to get to, and turn up, sandhill rd., i should have seen, at the very least, a glimpse of whatever this anomaly actually was. 

i was sadly disappointed as the object managed to elude additional sighting. my frustration level is enormous as i only caught enough of a glimpse of this object to know that i have no clue what it was. but i do know what it wasn't - something i've ever seen before.

thank you for taking the time to read.
content.summary: White private aircraft sized object.
